caption.p: Projected potential distribution maps showing areas of contraction, expansion and the area unchanged (stable) of the 5 IAPS classes under RCP 4.5 and RCP 8.5 for 2050 and 2070 in Sri Lanka. ( a) = 2050 compared to current climate; ( b) = 2070 compared to 2050; ( c) = 2070 compared to current climate.
